title: Can you sell vape products on Shopify? - Quora

response.answer_text: Hi. Yes, you can. You can sell almost any tangible and intangible goods on Shopify as long it's not illegal. You also need to thoroughly check what you can sell /not sell using the platform. To know more about Shopify prohibited businesses, review the Shopify Payments Terms of Service page, Section B - Getting A Service Account, No. 5. Shopify is entirely cloud-based easy to use and provides flexibility to access and run your business from anywhere with an internet connection. You can absolutely sell vape products on Shopify. However, you can’t use their native payment gateway - Shopify Payments. This is because Shopify payments does not support the sale of vape products. They’ll shut down your store pretty quick if you’re caught circumventing the rules. You’ll want to find a third party payment gateway who works with high risk businesses selling vape products. Plenty of options out there. Good luck!

You can. Generally, as long as the product is legal and your Shopify account does not have multiple high-risk issues (chargebacks, fraud, etc) they will allow you to sell vape products on the platform. However, their native payment gateway, Shopify Payments, will not be available to you as they prohibit tobacco/vape products. You’ll need to find a third-party gateway that will allow you to process transactions for vape products. For vapes you can dropship on Shopify, check out Smoke Drop - Smoke Drop – Ecommerce Plugins for Online Stores – Shopify App Store
